page.title: 20PLACES OF WORSHIP CLOWNE.
page.content: CLOWNE HAS A RANGE OF PLACES OF WORSHIP.THE CHRISTADELPHIANS HAVE A MEETING PLACE IN THE VILLAGE.THE SALVATION ARMY ALSO HAVE THEIR OWN MEETING PLACE.THE METHODIST HAVE THEIR CHAPEL AND THE ROMAN CATHOLICS THEIR CHURCH.THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND HAVE THE PARISH CHURCH OF ST.JOHN THE BAPTIST. THE LAST NAMED BEING THE OLDEST BUILDING IN THE VILLAGE.IT DATES FROM THE EARLY 12th CENTURY AND HAS A PERPENDICULAR TOWER ADDED DURING THE 15th CENTURY. COMPILATION OF DOMESDAY PROJECT FOR CLOWNE. THE DATA AND INFORMATOIN CONTAINED ON THIS DISC WAS COMPILED BY THE PUPILS OF 1SET1 OF MARKLAND SCHOOL CRESWELL AND THE PUPILS OF THE TOP CLASS AT CLOWNE INFANT SCHOOL,DIRECTED AND ASSISTED BY MR.P.HENDERSON, MR.R.DAVENPORT AND MRS.E.M.HIBBERT.
